thread.title: Here's what Facebook made off an average user in the last three months
thread.title_full: Here's what Facebook made off an average user in the last three months

author: Anita Balakrishnan
title: Here's what Facebook made off an average user in the last three months
text:
Here's what Facebook made off an average user in the last three months Here's how much you're worth to Facebook Jason Alden | Bloomberg via Getty Images 
It's no coincidence that Facebook is one of the world's richest companies. 
In company earnings reported on Wednesday, it revealed it made an average of $4.83 in revenue per user, globally, over the last quarter. In the United States and Canada, where disposable income is high and Facebook is well-established, each user was worth $19.81. 
Part of the company's success is its ability to make more and more money off of its existing users. It's ad revenue shot up 53% over the quarter .
